page.title: 13RECREATION
page.content: Out of a survey of 33 local people of all ages only ten felt that there were adequate recreational facilities in the area. Most of these were aged 12 years and under. Few people, however, are willing to travel outwith the local community to find additional facilities. Local amenities include a golf course, youth clubs, bowling greens, a swimming pool, snooker club, community youth discos, and "Speakers" club with games room. Most of those over 30 had home based interests such as reading, knitting, and t.v.viewing. The most popular community amenity was the swimming pool which had the highest usage rating in the survey. On average those interviewed watched 3.5 hours of television per day.Other interests noted included gardening, walking, ice skating,birdwatching, dancing and canoeing.
